basics.name: Melanie Thibodeau
basics.tagline: Software & Systems Engineer · Computer Vision · Defense & Aerospace

summary: I’m a software and systems engineer supporting compliance-driven systems in defense environments.
My background spans software development, requirements tracking, V&V, and applied computer vision research.

experience.title: Software & Systems Engineer
bullets: Assisted in the development in a rule-based automation tool using JavaScript to recommend strategies for various military missions
Performed verification and validation testing for system updates, including patch and release testing
Supported system integration and deployment activities, including on-site installation and operational monitoring
Created training plans and technical presentations based on program reviews, translating new developments into clear, reusable materials relied upon by team leaders for project briefings

experience.title: IT and Customer Support Intern
bullets: Verify daily the system’s status and logs to check for security breaches.
Test system and application patches and report any problems. Write blogs covering topics on blockchain, metadata, and the zero-day vulnerability with log4j.
Help customers with login issues, security permission issues, and product questions.

education.title: Graduate Researcher — Computer Vision
bullets: Optimized medical rash datasets for object detection using YOLOv7.
Built augmentation pipelines (CLAHE, photometric transforms, elastic deformation) and evaluated model performance.

projects.name: Virtual Portfolio
projects.summary: A minimal personal site with structured content and a skills-to-projects mapping.

projects.name: Optimizing Rash Datasets for Lyme Disease Detection
projects.summary: Dataset curation + augmentation experiments to improve detection performance.

projects.name: Rule-based Automation Tool
projects.summary: Assisted in the development in a rule-based automation tool using JavaScript to recommend strategies for various military mission within the Navy

footer.note: Currently open to software, systems, and simulation-focused roles.
